kDesc
It's a metaphor depicting humanity's inevitable minimalisation by the ever-growing vast machine.[#Legal]
C'est une métaphore de la disparition inévitable de l'homme, laissant place aux machines.[#Legal]
Eine Metapher für die immer größer werdende Verdrängung des Menschen durch die wachsende Automatisierung. [#Legal]
Una metafora dell'inevitabile marginalizzazione dell'umanità da parte dell'onnipresente mondo meccanizzato.[#Legal]
Una metáfora que muestra la inevitable minimización de la Humanidad por la gran e imparable maquinaria.[#Legal]
It's a metaphor depicting humanity's inevitable minimalization by the ever-growing vast machine.[#Legal]
점차 영토를 넓히고 있는 기계들 틈에서, 왜소해질 수 밖에 없는 인류의 숙명을 표현한 작품입니다. [#Legal]
It's a metaphor depicting humanity's inevitable minimalization by the ever-growing vast machine.[#Legal]
這作品比喻在不斷發展的巨型機器面前，人類無可避免地變得渺小。[#Legal]
這作品比喻在不斷發展的巨型機器面前，人類無可避免地變得渺小。[#Legal]
It's a metaphor depicting humanity's inevitable minimalization by the ever-growing vast machine.[#Legal]
